title: Email küldés gmail fiók felé nem működik
content:
Sziasztok, Saját domaint használunk, és a kimenő levelek nem mennek el a gmail fiókokba, más szolgáltatók email címére elmennem. Ezzel a hibaüzenettel pattannak vissza: This message was created automatically by mail delivery software.

A message that you sent could not be delivered to one or more of its recipients. This is a permanent error. The following address(es) failed: 

 hoffmannmonika71@gmail.com    host gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com [74.125.71.26]    SMTP error from remote mail server after end of data:    550-5.7.26 This mail is unauthenticated, which poses a security risk to the    550-5.7.26 sender and Gmail users, and has been blocked. The sender must    550-5.7.26 authenticate with at least one of SPF or DKIM. For this message,    550-5.7.26 DKIM checks did not pass and SPF check for [mixershop.hu] did not    550-5.7.26 pass with ip: [178.238.222.56]. The sender should visit    550-5.7.26  https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication for    550 5.7.26 instructions on setting up authentication. d15-20020a5d538f000000b0031454f8d57bsi534638wrv.744 - gsmtp


Reporting-MTA: dns; tbfiftysix.tarhely.eu

Action: failed Final-Recipient: rfc822;hoffmannmonika71@gmail.com Status: 5.0.0 Remote-MTA: dns; gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550-5.7.26 This mail is unauthenticated, which poses a security risk to the 

550-5.7.26 sender and Gmail users, and has been blocked. The sender must 550-5.7.26 authenticate with at least one of SPF or DKIM. For this message, 550-5.7.26 DKIM checks did not pass and SPF check for [mixershop.hu] did not 550-5.7.26 pass with ip: [178.238.222.56]. The sender should visit 550-5.7.26  https://support.google.com/mail/answer/81126#authentication for 550 5.7.26 instructions on setting up authentication. d15-20020a5d538f000000b0031454f8d57bsi534638wrv.744 - gsmtp

Köszönöm a segítséget ! Üdvözlettel König László
creator: konig.laszlo

title: timeout after END-OF-MESSAGE after upgrade to supernova
content:
Hi, i've upgraded to supernova on my linux (Oracle Linux Server release 7.9) and now if i send an email i've a timeout at end of session (the email is delivered but i've the error popup). In server the log says Aug 31 11:43:21 imap postfix/smtpd[32585]: connect from unknown[83.149.170.235] Aug 31 11:43:21 imap postfix/smtpd[32585]: B62C01007AD: client=unknown[83.149.170.235], sasl_method=PLAIN, sasl_username=r.xxx@tosnet.net Aug 31 11:43:21 imap postfix/cleanup[27232]: B62C01007AD: message-id=<b4f357e5-4fa4-4edc-a735-7191653d1e0b@tosnet.it> Aug 31 11:43:22 imap postfix/qmgr[24150]: B62C01007AD: from=<r.xxx@tosnet.it>, size=79993, nrcpt=1 (queue active) Aug 31 11:43:23 imap postfix/smtp[7294]: B62C01007AD: to=<xxx@gmail.com>, relay=gmail-smtp-in.l.google.com[74.125.128.27]:25, delay=2.2, delays=0.45/0.01/0.45/1.3, dsn=2.0.0, status=sent (250 2.0.0 OK 1693475003 si28-20020a170906cedc00b00984f07f9bc1si686277ejb.395 - gsmtp) Aug 31 11:43:23 imap postfix/qmgr[24150]: B62C01007AD: removed

Aug 31 11:44:07 imap postfix/smtpd[32585]: timeout after END-OF-MESSAGE from unknown[83.149.170.235] Aug 31 11:44:07 imap postfix/smtpd[32585]: disconnect from unknown[83.149.170.235] ehlo=1 auth=1 mail=1 rcpt=1 data=1 commands=5

i can't go back to old version, the profile was updated :( How i can do?
creator: robyt1

title: Codice di errore: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR
content:
Salve Ho un desktop, AMD A10-7800 Radeon R7, 12 Compute Cores 4C+8G 3.50 GHz, SO Windows 10 Home 64Bit ver. 22H2 19045.2006, come antivirus uso Kaspersky internet Security. Dopo l'aggionamento di win10 home, dalla versione d 21H alla 22H... non mi funziona più Thunderbird, non riesco più ne a mandare email e nemmeno a riceverle. Se mando un email mi da questo errore: [Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Non è stato possibile inviare il messaggio perché la connessione al server di posta in uscita (SMTP) out.virgilio.it è scaduta. Riprova.] Non ricevo email e questo è l'errore: (Codice di errore: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR)

Ho provato ha reinstallare per due volte Thunderbird ma succede sempre la stessa cosa.

Potete aiutarmi? Grazie
creator: toniruggenti

title: riparazione file posta
content: Buongiorno, ho riscontrato la mancanza di alcune mail nell'account di posta in entrata (configurata come pop). Ho fatto la riparazione della posta in arrivo e i messaggi mancanti sono comparsi e sono perfettamente leggibili, tuttavia se cambio cartella e passo dalla posta in arrivo alla posta inviata e poi torno alla posta in arrivo, i messaggi recuperati con la riparazione scompaiono. Rifacendo nuovamente la riparazione, compaiono nuovamente nella posta in arrivo. Ho provato a fare la compattazione prima e dopo la riparazione ma il problema non si risolve. Avete qualche idea per risolvere il problema? Grazie mille per la vostra disponibilità. Vinicio
creator: v.cefola

title: Thunderbird
content: Dobrý den, mám problém s Thunderbirdem. Skoro týden se mi nestahuje pošta a vpravo dole mi vždy vyskočí hláška "Nelze se připojit na IMAP server. Pravděpodobně jste překročili maximální počet povolených spojení na server. Pokud ANO, použijte dialog Rozšířené nastavené IMAP serveru pro zmenšení počtu spojení". Vše sem prolezl ale nikde jsem nic nenašel. Pomůže mi někdo?? Díky Lukáš
creator: lukas1977

title: Dark theme prevents reading highlighted code in messages
content:
When I use a dark theme, the highlighted code in email messages are washed out all white and unreadable unless they're explicitly & individually selected with the mouse.

See attached screenshot.

I'm not sure what kind of solution might be able to apply in this case so I'm here for help from the community.

Thanks in advance for your input.
creator: NginUS

title: Restoring
content: I have Backed up my whole system with Windows 11 Backup (because I was having problems with Edge and Windows Explorer) and saved the backup to another HD in the PC. I am having great trouble trying to restore my Address books and Mail in Thunderbird. There are multiple Profiles in my Thunderbird so picking the correct one is just a guess. Is there any chance of getting my Address book (mainly) and my Mail back? Kelvin

title: Impostazioni stampa "piè di pagina" ed altre informazioni
content: Salve a tutti, è possibile personalizzare l'intestazione ed il piè di pagina delle stampe delle mail di Mozilla Thunderbird? In particolare vorrei che stampasse a piè di pagina la data e l'ora di ricezione della mail e non quella della stampa. grazie
